website_summaries.verdict: Suitable if you have small projects around the house or are new to using this type of tool.
pros: Easy to use at less than 3 lbs
Brushless drill with a simple design
Ideal tool for beginners and DIYers
cons: Not as powerful as others, and doesn't provide necessary torque for heavy-duty jobs

customer_reviews.title: The 1/2" chuck is sweet and there is no visible run out
customer_reviews.text: The big decision was if I needed the hammer option. I have a cheap corded hammer drill but when I need it I can never find it or left it at home. This replaces my heavy 14.4v Milwaukee drill and I can't believe the increase in power and run time. I still need the old one for the 4" hole saw but for 99% of my tasks this is the drill. The 1/2" chuck is sweet and there is no visible run out. I sleep with it under my pillow and it's so compact I hardly know it's there. Pull the trigger, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect DIY Drill
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion this is one of the best drills you can buy for diy projects. I previously owned a Dewalt 18v cordless drill which I loved, that drill took an enormous amount of abuse. When that finally died I decided to try something smaller. I do not miss that extra size, weight or power I had with the Dewalt. This drill is perfect for everything I need it for. If I were using the drill everyday all day I would have purchased another 18v but don't let this drill fool you it has plenty of power and so far the battery life has been great.
customer_reviews.author: kennypowers

customer_reviews.title: Give me Fuel, I don't need a fire
customer_reviews.text: A long time ago in a plumbing truck far away I had 18 volt DeWalt cordless tools, it's all I bought; then I realized I didn't really need that much power (and size) to get the job done. The M12 Fuel stuff is actually a lot more powerful than you think it would be and comes with a great warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Trombone

customer_reviews.title: Great Drill
customer_reviews.text: Another addition to my 12v line of Milwaukee. Have used it numerous times and it does exactly what it was designed to do. Worked flawlessly drilling holes in concrete for TapCon screws and has sufficient speed controls for almost any drilling or polishing need.
customer_reviews.author: Elwood Horton

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee M12 Hammer Drill - Tool Money Well Spent
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Hammer Drill Driver, At less than $70 and it does it all.
customer_reviews.author: The Mechanic

customer_reviews.title: My go to drill for light to medium duty installation ...
customer_reviews.text: My go to drill for light to medium duty installation work. Lightweight and powerful makes this ideal when on a ladder
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Brown

customer_reviews.title: Bad ass tool
customer_reviews.text: I love this drill use it all time and every chance I can has never let me down
customer_reviews.author: james sampson

customer_reviews.title: its good
customer_reviews.text: works good but trigger sticks and cannot squeez until you jiggle it to the left..the local hardware store sells the same drill for $169 and it feels more quality made than this one but for almost 1/3 of the price...i cant complain...it has plenty of torque for a 12v
customer_reviews.author: Rocky's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee is setting the standard
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical at first. Owned snap-on and DeWalt 20 and Milwaukee 18 volts, and this this drill for it's size can perform with the the bigger drills. Maybe my all time favorite drill. Great power and performance and its light weight and compact size, for auto mechanics and body guys it's a must have
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great drills
customer_reviews.text: The M12 series are a fantastic group of tools. I have 4 that I use daily at work building Gulfstream business jet interiors. They're light, compact and easy to use in small areas.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Vail

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to Milwulaukee name!!!!
customer_reviews.text: At first the drill seemed unbalanced but when I inserted the battery it became more distributed in weight. My experience with Milwaukee is that their cordless tools are easy to use and the battery life is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R Grieve II

customer_reviews.title: Great at putting holes in hard things
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great light-duty hammer drill for a home-gamer putting small holes in brick and concrete. The weight is reassuring and the construction is plenty stiff when you're reefing on it. If you're already bought into the M12 platform, this is a solid addition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really has a lot of power.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool, I was really against this type of tool finding it useless, but it quickly replaced my clutches drill driver, has a lot more power and options which is why I decided to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Jpena325

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Milwaukee Tools are the best and the most affordable I work in a shop and we make this tools go true hell and back and they perform great all the time .
customer_reviews.author: Real reviews no BS

customer_reviews.title: It worked only 11 month!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year ago. At first time it was working well. But after 11 month it stopped working. The problem was a button. I do not live in USA. I said it to a seller. They answered that the warranty works only in USA or canada. I asked only for a button but they refused me
customer_reviews.author: Martoz

customer_reviews.title: I feel like this was a refurbished item as it arrived in plastic and not even a box.
customer_reviews.text: Bought May 17th 2018. This is my 2nd drill in this model. The 1st one was a monsterand lasted 3 yrs if daily use. The 2nd pne didnt last 2 months, and never really worked half as goodasthe 1st one. taWill be trying to warranty with the seller this week.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: great drill, however i received a used and dirty drill.

customer_reviews.title: Drilling fanatic!
customer_reviews.text: Best that money can buy. Highly recommended for those who have a need for it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Best Hammer Drill for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly powerful for a 12 volt battery. The torque settings and impact setting work beautifully. Strongly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: errivera

customer_reviews.title: Better than most 18 V drill’s
customer_reviews.text: I have had this drill for well over a year now and use it every day in my cabinet business it never stops Lightweight and drills Into Hickory and oak and walnut with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Dale R Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: great tool. This one is far better
customer_reviews.text: I have used my m12 drill for years, great tool. This one is far better. Adding was a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: Great drill!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great drill! Probably best for smaller DIY projects around the house. If you're planning on drilling several holes for larger projects or on a work site you should buy the 18V like I should have... Guess I'll save my money and buy the 18V.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous 96

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I can't rave enough about the M12 lineup... Easy to use, powerful for the size and compares to my bosses snapon.
customer_reviews.author: Darkness Nation

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement or expansion drill.
customer_reviews.text: Great way to add a hammer drill to your M12 collection, or in my case to replace a stolen drill. Excellent price and condition.
customer_reviews.author: Cardinal Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow... if you are on the fence, don't hesitate. I already had a Millwaukee impact driver with the M12 batteries... but needed a hammer drill to make holes in bluestone and a cement foundation. Couple this with some Dewalt carbide-tipped bits and you will cut through masonry like butter.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great . good size . 1/2 chuck way better than the 3/8 .

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the quality and power in a compact lightweight drill.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyM

customer_reviews.title: Hands down I think this 12v hammer drill is amazing. I drill a lot of 7/8 holes in ...
customer_reviews.text: Hands down I think this 12v hammer drill is amazing . I drill a lot of 7/8 holes in masonry for security cameras and it blows right through!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the grip size, good for small portable jobs. Doesn't have the strength of the 18 volt models
customer_reviews.author: slowpoke

customer_reviews.title: perfect, just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: New, perfect, just as advertised. I am very glad I purchased it ...
customer_reviews.author: Uruguayan Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with 12v fuels!
customer_reviews.text: Love my drill! Love my 12v fuel impact more but still live this too... Basically a full sized drill in weight and length though not very compact
customer_reviews.author: FatherFigure

customer_reviews.title: Low Torque
customer_reviews.text: I was a little underwhelmed with the torque of the drill in removing some bolts on my car, but it's ergonomic and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Chad E

customer_reviews.title: Hammer time!
customer_reviews.text: Love this whole system. Small, powerful and dependable. Much better than other brands I have tried and regretted.
customer_reviews.author: Waterwalker

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great drill for a home owner not good for shop work
customer_reviews.author: WickedAB

customer_reviews.title: Works. Hammers and stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well at drilling, driving, and hammer-drilling. Most hammer drills feel cheap when drilling with out hammer mode. This works so well, it makes me think I should sell my non-hammer m12 fuel drill. Drills fine with 1inch spade bits through 2inch pine. Cuts out intermittently with 1+1/8" spade bits (possibly damaging battery/drill according to the manual). Drills through mortar pretty easily, and through brick reasonably well which is great for such a small drill. It's no rotary hammer but hey, it's only 12V.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present, he loves it. Came as promised
customer_reviews.author: B. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: The greatest drill you wish you bought sooner
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a light compact all around great drill/ hammer drill. Then u have stumbled on the perfect product. I have multiple 12v fuel products. And the are by far the best power tools I have purchased hands down. You will not be disappointed be ready to leave the heavy 18v at home. To give you an idea of how great fuel 12v are. I removed lug nuts on my work van when it got a flat. With the impact 12v and this drill def is worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Disligaf

customer_reviews.title: this little driver is great! its small but has loads of power and ...
customer_reviews.text: this little driver is great! its small but has loads of power and with the larger battery I can drive a lot screws before a charge.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived packed nicely Working Bare tool .. no bag or anything

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a older model. Couldn't pass up the price ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a older model. Couldn't pass up the price. Saves time and quite durable as i am very abusive on tools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for a quick hanger or block anchor
customer_reviews.text: very lightweight but powerfull drill. hammer drill works well for small diameter holes.great for a quick hanger or block anchor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best 12v drill on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This drill. Where do I start. Its milwaukee so the quality is top notch as to be expected. The power this little 12v drill has is incredible. Some days I question if its really only 12v. I am a maintenance and laugh when I see other techs with 18v drills. They use my drill and realize why I laughed. This drill is for daily work and will do anything outside of major construction you need it to. Get the extended battery while your at it!
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Great product it came new with no box or batteries but works as should. I have been using it for a 6" ice auger and has plenty of power for 16" thick ice. No problems and very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price, fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Great drill! I am using the hammer function to attach some interior panels to my basement block walls.

customer_reviews.title: awesome purchase! very happy arrived like
customer_reviews.text: boom the reviews are correct. awesome purchase! very happy arrived like new

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drill
customer_reviews.text: Could not ask for anymore from this drill! Replacing a Dewalt 20v without missing a beat.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and small with lots of power would recommend nice gun
customer_reviews.author: Greg Whitmore

customer_reviews.text: M12 fuel is almost as fast as the m18. Company supplies us with m18, but buying your own set of m12 fuels really saves you. M18 is so large and heavy, and sometimes can't get into small places. M12 isnot anything special, but the fuel line is amazing with 4.0 batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Flamenco

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a present for my friend and he loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This drill works for just about anything but my 3/4 plus augers and large hole saws.

customer_reviews.title: I love the M12 line up from Milwaukee this drill feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the M12 line up from Milwaukee this drill feel like a heavy duty tool that will last for years to come
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Radosevich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I did not know there was a difference between Fuel and Non fuel. The hammer drill was very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow....wow
customer_reviews.text: Hi guys this is Ted I just wanted to tell you how about this beautiful hammer drill that I bought from Amazon. It is a fantastic piece of equipment. I know that a lot of people see these five star ratings and everything else and they think gold somebody's writing these but my goodness you can't do nothing but put a five-star on this piece of equipment. And for the price you can't beat it..Wow..this is my 2nd.still great Wow
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Ted

customer_reviews.title: I do not know if one could ask for more ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not know if one could ask for more from a 12v drill. I will update my review after i have used it for longer but as of right now more than worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: michael thompson

customer_reviews.title: Quality tool compact size would highly recommend, don't let the m12 size fool you will ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality tool compact size would highly recommend, don't let the m12 size fool you will do all that you ask of it.
customer_reviews.author: patrick sarver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i love this hammer drill m12,you must have this tool in your garage.
customer_reviews.author: RN A RN

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the size fool you
customer_reviews.text: This little drill is a beast. Milwaukee = quality. Over the last year I have upgraded all of my power tools to Milwaukee. No, they don't give me free products to praise them in reviews. I only wish they did. I have spent over 1000 dollars on m12 and m18 fuel items and I do not regret it a bit. You won't either.
customer_reviews.author: Will Cooke

customer_reviews.title: While a bit larger than all the other M12 tools ...
customer_reviews.text: While a bit larger than all the other M12 tools I have, this combines the high speed drill, hammer driver, and clutch driver all into a single tool. My new go-to M12 device and I only grab this one anymore as it is so incredibly capable. Couple that with the brushless motor long run-time on the same batteries and huge torque and you have a stellar tool that beats most others in my arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hoekstra

customer_reviews.title: Good brushless drill but a little heavy for hours of opeartion
customer_reviews.text: Although made in China, the majority of my power tools are Milwaukees as they share the same batteries (the M12 series) and is a cost-effective approach. This drill may be a bit heavier than the other models, but it is brushless and does not produce spark/arc. If you need to use a drill for many hours, I recommend less-expensive, non-hammer mode type which is lighter than this model.
customer_reviews.author: JPN850R

customer_reviews.title: Works great with the new batteries to
customer_reviews.text: Item showed up on time and was everything I expected. Works great with the new batteries to.
customer_reviews.author: josh draves

customer_reviews.title: The drill is fine, but the chuck is complete garbage
customer_reviews.text: The drill is fine, but the chuck is complete garbage. It has a grinding right out of the box and doesn't run true. The bit runs true enough but the chuck wobbles. This is unacceptable for the Fuel "Professional" line. I'm now looking at replacing the chuck as it very much bothers me that the chuck has a metal grinding feel to it every time you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Pinney

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of power for drilling, mine was assembled in ...
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of power for drilling, mine was assembled in some backwoods factory and doesn't drill straight. I guess .050" runout is acceptable over there.
customer_reviews.author: E. Allegretti

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Extremely light weight but don't let that fool you. This drill is as strong as any other impact drill I've ever used and the battery will last for a whole 8 hour work day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: POWERFUL DRILL BUT EATS 2 MAH STICK BATS FAST
customer_reviews.text: POWERFUL DRILL DEFINITELY LIGHTER THAN DEW ALT 18 VOLT HAMMER BUT EATS BATTERIES. RECOMMEND 4 MAH OR SEVERAL 2 MAH ON HAND
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: it worked great till it had a four foot drop on the ...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too much power in such a small tool. Should be illegal.

customer_reviews.title: Love this tool
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe the power this 12 volt little hammer drill has, it's my new favorite toy.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Drill stopped working after just a few uses and has constant power drop issues.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It don't make the jab well, at the last missing power...
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Salinas

customer_reviews.title: A dud.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this drill. I put a battery in it, it ran for 5 seconds and started smoking and then locked up. It came only wrapped in bubble wrap, no original box like a new one should have. So it may just be a seller problem. Maybe just a dud, I'll update this review if I get a new one that works. Doesn't speak well for quality control though.
customer_reviews.author: Marty B.

customer_reviews.title: Rebuilt no good
customer_reviews.text: Item is rebuilt. Not good at all. Trigger button fell off first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Blassingame

customer_reviews.title: This drill is pushed to the limit everyday and always performs excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I use this drill and others daily on the job. This is a replacement drill, my original one lasted two years, which is a year longer than expected. This drill is pushed to the limit everyday and always performs excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Myers
